response.summary: Management engineering master's student and Chemical engineer interested on consulting. I have experience in the Pharmaceutical Medicinal Cannabis, brewery and scientific research.  I am characterized by my leadership, analysis and organization. Entrepreneur with products based on 'Panela' jaggery from sugar cane. Native Spanish, Advance English level, intermediate in Italian and Portuguese and basic in French. Currently living in Milan, Italy. Open to work!
response.skills: Microsoft Office, Investigación, Oratoria, Medios sociales, Liderazgo de equipos, Project Management

profile_positions.description:
In charge of the quality team in the cannabis industry focused in the medicinal aspects.

Production of Cannabis derivatives, achieving all the international requirements for GMP, Eu-GMP and GAP. 
- Risk analysis for quality requirements. 
- Stability studies for final product. 
- Communication with suppliers of raw materials and quality controls (analytical laboratories)
- Inspections of quality assurance. Audits to suppliers. 
- Development, monitoring of CAPAs (Corrective and preventive actions) according to findings or deficiencies in the process. 
- Validation of processes. Conditions, requirements, batch records, registration.
profile_positions.title: Quality Responsible

profile_positions.description: - Inspections internally in the company to achieve all the EuGMP requirements
profile_positions.title: Quality Inspector

profile_positions.description: In charge of the design to scale up the process from pilot to Industrial level. Extraction, distillation of cannabis extracts and the R&D of Cannabis final products. Cannabinoids profile analysis with HPLC techniques.
profile_positions.title: Technical Director

profile_positions.description: Research assistant at Davidson school of chemical engineering at Purdue University. Developing a research project in biotechnology. Analysing the effect of Atrazine as herbicide in the epigenome of neuronal development.
profile_positions.title: Research Intern

profile_positions.description: Development of a project focused on the product losses during processing. Analyzing composition from raw materials and the traceability of this effect throughout the process.
profile_positions.title: Professional Intern

profile_positions.description:
Assistant student in Headquarter laboratories direction at Universidad Nacional. 
Developing activities as: database management, website programming
and planning, visits to laboratories in order to gather information about facilities and safety protocols.
profile_positions.title: Administrative Assistant

profile_positions.description: Developing different projects in the research group of Chemical and Biochemical processes. Involving activities as Cell culture, growth kinetic, glucose and cellular activity quantification using colorimetric methods.
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant

profile_positions.description: Personal teacher in areas of physics, mathematics and chemistry.
profile_positions.title: Academic Tutor

company.name: PIDEKA SAS
company.description:
At PIDEKA, we take responsibility for improving the quality of life for millions of people around the world, cultivating high-quality medicinal cannabis in a sustainable way and researching to create strains specifically designed to treat different diseases, such as cancer, epilepsy, depression, Parkinson's. Taking care of health is in our nature.

We are a company dedicated to the cultivation of the cannabis plant for the transformation of pharmaceutical-grade derivatives and their commercialization. We have state-of-the-art facilities and technology, meeting high-quality standards and combined with scientific research to produce products that contribute to improving people's quality of life
